project.name: Keyboard
project.description: A SpringRoll plugin to ease keyboard input use

springroll.Keyboard.name: springroll.Keyboard
springroll.Keyboard.description: A class for easier keyboard controls, from simple key events to complex key combinations.

params.name: target
params.description: The DOM element to listen to key events on.

params.name: locale
params.description:
The keyboard locale, like springroll.USLocale, which defines keys to
                       keep track of.

springroll.Application.name: springroll.Application
springroll.Application.description:
Create an app plugin for Keyboard, all properties and methods documented
in this class are mixed-in to the main Application

springroll.keyboard.USLocale.name: springroll.keyboard.USLocale
springroll.keyboard.USLocale.description:
USLocale is the standard keyboard layout for US computers. All standard keys are included.
Keys to note:

* 'OS' represents both the Windows key and the 'command' key, although 'command'
  is also available when the client is running MacOS.

* 'meta' represents 'ctrl' on Windows and Linux, and 'command' on OSX. Use this when creating
  keyboard shortcuts in web apps.

classitems.description: The DOM element that the key event listeners are attached to.
classitems.name: target

classitems.description: All keys that are listened to, arranged by key code.
classitems.name: _keysByCode

classitems.description: All keys that are listened to, arranged by key name.
classitems.name: _keysByName

classitems.description: All key combinations that have been registered
classitems.name: _activeCombos

classitems.description:
Keys that have been updated since the most recent frame update. This array gets wiped
each _update call.
classitems.name: _updatedKeys

classitems.description: The callback used when key detection has ended.
classitems.name: detectKeyCallback

classitems.description: The key object that is used to cancel key detection.
classitems.name: detectCancelKey

classitems.description:
If key detection should allow key modifiers, instead of just detecting those keys
by themselves
classitems.name: detectModifiers

classitems.description: The list of key names for modifier keys - 'ctrl', 'alt', 'shift', and 'command'.
classitems.name: modifiers

classitems.description: The list of key names for scrolling control keys
classitems.name: scrollKeys

classitems.description:
Adds a listener for keydown events on a specific key, when a key is first pressed down. The
callback will be passed the key name, in case the same callback is used for multiple keys.
classitems.name: addKeyDown

params.name: keyName
params.description: The name(s) of the key, from the locale, to listen for.

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to call when the key is first pressed.

params.name: preventDefault
params.description:
If the key should have the default action prevented
                                        while this listener is attached.

classitems.description: Removes a listener for keydown events on a specific key.
classitems.name: removeKeyDown

params.name: keyName
params.description: The name(s) of the key, from the locale, to listen for.

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to be removed from the listener list.

classitems.description:
Adds a listener for repeated keydown events on a specific key. The callback will be passed
the key name, in case the same callback is used for multiple keys.
classitems.name: addKeyRepeat

params.name: keyName
params.description: The name(s) of the key, from the locale, to listen for.

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to call when the key is first pressed.

params.name: preventDefault
params.description:
If the key should have the default action prevented
                                        while this listener is attached.

classitems.description: Removes a listener for repeated keydown events on a specific key.
classitems.name: removeKeyRepeat

params.name: keyName
params.description: The name(s) of the key, from the locale, to listen for.

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to be removed from the listener list.

classitems.description:
Adds a listener for keyup events on a specific key. The callback will be passed the key
name, in case the same callback is used for multiple keys.
classitems.name: addKeyUp

params.name: keyName
params.description: The name(s) of the key, from the locale, to listen for.

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to call when the key is released.

params.name: preventDefault
params.description:
If the key should have the default action prevented
                                        while this listener is attached.

classitems.description: Removes a listener for keyup events on a specific key.
classitems.name: removeKeyUp

params.name: keyName
params.description: The name(s) of the key, from the locale, to listen for.

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to be removed from the listener list.

classitems.description:
Sets if the default browser action should be prevented on a specific key. This is good
for keys that are only checked with justPressed(), isDown(), and justReleased().
classitems.name: setPreventDefaultOnKey

params.name: keyName
params.description: The name(s) of the key, from the locale, to listen for.

params.name: preventDefault
params.description: If the key should have the default action prevented.

classitems.description: Restricts the arrow keys and spacebar from scrolling the page.
classitems.name: restrictScrollingKeys

classitems.description:
Creates a key combination. Combination syntax is key names separated by '+' for simultaneous
keys and '>' for sequential keys. Whitespace is required around the '+' and '>' separators.
Keys must be fully released between '>' stages.
classitems.name: addCombo

params.name: comboString
params.description: A string defining how the key combination functions.

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to called when the combination successfully fires.

params.name: preventDefault
params.description:
If the combo should have the default action prevented,
                                       for any successful step of it that is completed.

classitems.description:
Removes a listener for a key combination. If no listeners remain, that key
combination is destroyed.
classitems.name: removeKeyUp

params.name: comboString
params.description: The comboString used to create the combination.

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to be removed from the listener list.

classitems.description: Begins listening for the next key to be pressed (or repeated). The callback is passed the name of that key, so that it can then be used with other functions. Additionally, if the key pressed does not have a recognized keyCode, then an entry is created for it with the name 'key_%keyCode%'. If the cancel key is pressed, then the callback is passed null. If allowModifiers is true, then the result should be considered a key combination to be used with addCombo().
classitems.name: detectNextKey

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to be called when a key is pressed.

params.name: cancelKey
params.description: The name of the key to cancel the listener. If explictly passed null, then the "esc" key can be detected and this action can only be cancelled with stopDetecting().

params.name: allowModifiers
params.description:
If key modifiers (ctrl, alt, shift, command) should
                                        be detected as modifications of the pressed key
                                        instead of as their own keypresses.

classitems.description: Checks to see if a key has begun to be pressed since the last Application 'update' event.
classitems.name: justPressed

params.name: keyName
params.description: The name of the key to check.

return.description: If the key was just pressed or not.

classitems.description: Checks to see if a key is being held down.
classitems.name: isDown

params.name: keyName
params.description: The name of the key to check.

return.description: If the key is down or not.

classitems.description: Checks to see if a key has been released since the last Application 'update' event.
classitems.name: justReleased

params.name: keyName
params.description: The name of the key to check.

return.description: If the key was just released or not.

classitems.description:
If the Keyboard should be handling key events or not. Setting this to false immediately
resets the status of any keys that are currently pressed.
classitems.name: enabled

classitems.description:
Clears the status of all keys that are pressed, requiring them to be released and pressed
again.
classitems.name: clearKeys

classitems.description: Listener for when the target has lost focus, to call clearKeys().
classitems.name: _onFocusLost

params.name: ev
params.description: The event from the DOM.

classitems.description: Listener for Application 'paused' events. Disables the Keyboard.
classitems.name: _onPaused

classitems.description:
Listener for Application 'resumed' events. Enables the Keyboard and gives browser focus
to the target.
classitems.name: _onResumed

classitems.description:
Listener for Application 'update' events. This is created with a priority of -1000 so that
it can reset justPressed() and justReleased() states after other code has had a chance to
check them.
classitems.name: _update

params.name: elapsed
params.description: Milliseconds elapsed since the previous update.

classitems.description: Listener for keydown events on the target.
classitems.name: _keyDown

params.name: ev
params.description: The keyboard event.

classitems.description: Listener for keyup events on the target.
classitems.name: _keyUp

params.name: ev
params.description: The keyboard event.

classitems.description: Destroys the keyboard and removes all listeners. Do not use after this is called.
classitems.name: destroy

classitems.description: The locale to use for keycodes.
classitems.name: options.keyboardLocale

classitems.description: The target DOM to listen to all keyboard events from.
classitems.name: options.keyboardTarget

classitems.description: The OS button, either Windows or Apple Button
classitems.name: OS

classitems.description:
on windows keyboard, located where the right 'windows' key might be
not fired by Safari/Chrome on OSX (but is on FF?)
classitems.name: context_menu

classitems.description: Number pad lock, 'num lock' is 'clear' on Mac keyboards
classitems.name: num_lock

classitems.description: The command (Mac OSX) or ctrl (Windows) key
classitems.name: meta
